name: Black Forest
hint: Dense forested mountain range in southwestern Germany

name: Scandinavian Fjords
hint: Dramatic glacially carved inlets along Norway's coastline

name: Hungarian Plains
hint: Vast flat grassland in central Hungary, also called the Puszta

name: Iberian Peninsula
hint: Southwestern European peninsula containing Spain and Portugal

name: Alps Region
hint: Highest and most extensive mountain range in Europe

name: Scottish Highlands
hint: Rugged mountainous region of northern Scotland

name: Lapland Tundra
hint: Arctic region in northern Finland and Scandinavia, home of the Sami people

name: Po Valley
hint: Major fertile plain in northern Italy, Italy's agricultural heartland

name: Carpathian Mountains
hint: Eastern European mountain arc stretching from Czech Republic to Romania

name: Mediterranean Coast
hint: Southern European coastline famous for its climate, stretching from Spain to Greece
